name: Small Treasures
description:
This is my game for Mutate Game Jam #3!

You need Mutate installed to play it.

A short game where you try to get 10 prize toys from the claw machines.

Ideas/wishlist for future updates (not promised, but if I ever feel like it) includes making the capsule machines functional and their prizes able to count towards the score, filling out the game center with more plushies and more machines, and adding a money function so you can run out of coins to play with.
